content:
Ballot ID 1311 HL7 CDA® R2 Implementation Guide: Trauma Registry Data Submission, Release 2 - US Realm (unable to find)
But I can only find
Ballot ID 1214 HL7 CDA® R2 Implementation Guide: Trauma Registry Data Submission, Release 1 - US Realm
Does Release 2 exist?
George, I'm not sure if this is helpful but I have been able to find this information:
There is also mention of a 2017 May Ballot Cycle for Release 2 on this page: http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/tsc/BallotManagement/Reports/NoReconPackage_all_wgs.cfm
However, I don't have information on its status, only those mentions.
David, Thank you. Second link does specify that 1214 is being withdrawn due to ANSI timing Constraints and replaced by project 1311.
